desc.description: This video was originally supposed to be uploaded yesterday on Kara's birthday as a surprise, but due to technical difficulties and my video editing ineptitude, I showed her a half finished version yesterday and she had to help me upload it today (Kara, you're the best).Since we don't have room for things and our life is constant "experience," I thought for Kara's birthday, the best gift I could give her would be to show her the impact she's had on the world over the last 3 years.THANK YOU so much to everyone who contributed to this video and helped make this possible!Kara, I love you!-Nate
desc.title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY KARA! The world is a better place because of you :)
